item.title: Growing Nation-State Alliances Increase U.S. Cyber Risks
item.description: NATO countries are facing a growing breadth and depth of nation-state cyber attacks as Russia, China, Iran and other countries increase military cyber cooperation.

item.title: Challenges With AI: Artistry, Copyrights and Fake News
item.description: The world is buzzing about the new AI applications that are rapidly changing the landscape at home and work. But what about copyright protections, artistry and even fake news as our AI journey accelerates?

item.title: Roseville, Calif., CIO Brings Global Background to Local Gov
item.description: Hong Sae is the CIO for the city of Roseville, Calif., and he has a tremendous track record of success in both Texas and California local government.

item.title: Procurement Guide Offers Best Practices for Moving to Cloud
item.description: The Center for Digital Government just released a new guide to help governments in their cloud journeys. Here’s why cybersecurity pros should pay close attention.

item.title: New National Cybersecurity Strategy: What Do You Need to Know?
item.description: The White House released a new national cybersecurity strategy this past week with five pillars. What’s in the plan, and how will this impact public- and private-sector organizations?

item.title: One Year Later: Cyber Battles Still Rage in Ukraine
item.description: This past week was dominated with stories surrounding the one-year mark of Russia’s invasion into Ukraine. What have we learned on the global cybersecurity front in that time?

item.title: After Corporate Tech Layoffs, Can Governments Benefit?
item.description: Almost every day, online media sources proclaim new layoffs for tech workers. So how are federal, state and local governments trying to attract these talented pros now?

item.title: Quantum Computers: What Is Q-Day? And What’s the Solution?
item.description: Quantum computers hold the promise of amazing advances in numerous fields. So why are cybersecurity experts so worried about Q-Day? What must be done now to prepare?

item.title: From Progress to Bans: How Close Are Human Microchip Implants?
item.description: A lot has happened in the past 12 months regarding human microchip implants. Here’s your roundup of recent developments.

item.title: ChatGPT: Hopes, Dreams, Cheating and Cybersecurity
item.description: ChatGPT is an AI-powered chatbot created by OpenAI. So what are the opportunities and risks with using this technology across different domains?
